SALESFORCE HELP

VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Show Product Image Thumbnails for Orders with LLI Checkout

Help provide more visual cues to buyers as they complete checkout, and reinforce trust in your brand's buyer experience. When your storefront uses line-level independence (LLI) checkout, thumbnail images for the order's products now appear in several sections of the Checkout page and My Account page.

Where: This change applies to B2B Commerce for Visualforce Winter ’21 (version 4.13) in Lightning Experience and Salesforce Classic in Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.

Why: In previous versions of B2B Commerce for Visualforce, product thumbnail images displayed in the following locations for orders placed with standard checkout only:

Shipping Details section of the Checkout page
Order Review section of the Checkout page
Order Confirmation section of the Checkout page
Order details viewed from the My Orders section of the My Account page

No product thumbnail images displayed for orders placed with LLI checkout. With this change, product thumbnail images now display in these locations for orders placed with either standard or LLI checkout.

How: After you upgrade the managed package, this enhancement is available automatically.

SEE ALSO
Standard Checkout versus Line-Level Independence (LLI) Checkout
